research_question: Is Tuna-9 calibration stable over time? The connectivity probe measured 92.3% Bell fidelity on q[2,4]. Does this hold after the daemon's first successful run? Temporal stability is critical for reproducibility claims.
description: Bell state recalibration on Tuna-9's best qubit pair [2,4]. 4096 shots for statistical precision. Compare with connectivity probe baseline (92.3%) and daemon-001 result on [0,1] (89.3%).
